text: function scrape process holdings data iShares website.

title: Scrape index data from the iShares website — get_ishares_index_data
Scrape index data from the iShares website — get_ishares_index_data
text: url string containing url desired iShares index data. name string containing name index. timestamp string indicating desired timestamp, year quarter, "YYYYMMDD" (e.g. "20201231"). Data scraped first day corresponding quarter.

title: Scrape index data from the iShares website — get_ishares_index_data
Scrape index data from the iShares website — get_ishares_index_data
code: if (FALSE) { url <-   paste0(     "https://www.ishares.com/uk/individual/en/products/",     "251813/ishares-global-corporate-bond-ucits-etf/"   ) name <- "iShares Global Corporate Bond UCITS ETF <USD (Distributing)>" timestamp <- "20211231"  get_ishares_index_data(url, name, timestamp) }
